```r

ASV.nested$Step2.tibble %>% as.data.frame() %>% filter(., nReads>0) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  filter(sample %in% Taylor_samples) -> taylor_step2.tibble

ASV.nested$Step2.tibble %>% as.data.frame() %>% filter(., nReads>0) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  filter(!sample %in% Taylor_samples) -> mpa_step2.tibble
```
